p: Rotary evaporator (yamato, Japan), lyophilizer (OPERON, OPR-FDU-5012, Korea), digital plethysmometer (Ugo Basile-Cat no 7140, Italy) electronic balance (KERN-ALJ 220–4, Germany), tissue Drying Oven (Medite – Medizin technik, Germany), syringes with needles, feeding tube, hot Plate (Orchid Scientific, India.) were used with their respective function.
